components.name: AppComponent
BasketComponent
ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button mat-button [ngStyle]='{"background-color": background}' [color]='background' *ngIf='variant === "default"'>{{label}}</button>
<button mat-raised-button [ngStyle]='{"background-color": background}'  [color]='background' *ngIf='variant === "raised"'>{{label}}</button>
<button mat-stroked-button [ngStyle]='{"background-color": background}'  [color]='background' *ngIf='variant === "stroked"'>{{label}}</button>
<button mat-flat-button [color]='background' *ngIf='variant === "flat"' >{{label}}</button>
